display_title.display_title:
México - Proyecto de
            Modernización de las Carreteras Federales: Evaluación ambiental

docna.cdata!:
Mexico - Federal Roads Modernization Project
            : environmental assessment

repnme.cdata!:
Mexico - Federal Roads Modernization
            Project : environmental assessment

0.cdata!:
Mexico - Manifestacion de impacto
            ambiental modalidad general de la carretera Mexico :
            Queretaro, Tramo Palmillas - Queretaro (60KM), en el estado
            de Queretaro

abstracts.cdata!:
This report presents the environmental
            impact assessment of the Federal Roads Modernization
            Project.  Chapter I contains general information related to
            the work and study data.  Chapter II includes a description
            of the works done during the preparation of the
            construction, operation and maintenance of the project site.
            Chapter III presents information related to the general
            aspects of the natural and socio-economic medium of the
            project zone, as far as physical, biological, social, and
            economic risks are concerned.  Chapter IV includes an
            analysis of the work as per stipulated regulations.  Chapter
            V constitutes the identification of the potential
            environmental impact that the project generates.  Finally,
            chapter VI presents preventative measures of the identified
            environmental impact.
